time.title: Tuesday, February 1
time.more: Chinese New Year 2022 falls on Tuesday, February 1st, 2022, and celebrations culminate with the Lantern Festival on February 15th, 2022.

length.q: How Long is Chinese New Year?
length.title: 16 Days
length.more: Celebrations last up to 16 days, but only the first 7 days are considered a public holiday (January 31st–February 6th, 2022).

zodiac.title: Tiger
zodiac.more: Chinese New Year marks the transition between zodiac signs 2022 is the year of the Tiger 2021 the year of the Ox.

phase_1.title: Little Year
phase_1.more: Preparations for the new year begin on January 24th, 2022, and last until New Years Eve.

phase_2.title: Spring Festival
phase_2.more: Chinese New Year officially begins on February 1st, 2022, and ends on February 15th.

phase_3.title: Lantern Festival
phase_3.more: Preparations begin the 12th, and the Lantern Festival is held on February 15th.
